1/* $NetBSD: ntomask.c,v 1.2 2012/07/22 14:27:36 darrenr Exp $ */
2
3/*
4 * Copyright (C) 2012 by Darren Reed.
5 *
6 * See the IPFILTER.LICENCE file for details on licencing.
7 *
8 * Id: ntomask.c,v 1.1.1.2 2012/07/22 13:44:39 darrenr Exp $
9 */
10
11#include "ipf.h"
12
13int ntomask(family, nbits, ap)
14 int family, nbits;
15 u_32_t *ap;
16{
17 u_32_t mask;
18
19 if (nbits < 0)
20 return -1;
21
22 switch (family)
23 {
24 case AF_INET :
25 if (nbits > 32 || use_inet6 == 1)
26 return -1;
27 if (nbits == 0) {
28 mask = 0;
29 } else {
30 mask = 0xffffffff;
31 mask <<= (32 - nbits);
32 }
33 *ap = htonl(mask);
34 break;
35
36 case 0 :
37 case AF_INET6 :
38 if ((nbits > 128) || (use_inet6 == -1))
39 return -1;
40 fill6bits(nbits, ap);
41 break;
42
43 default :
44 return -1;
45 }
46 return 0;
47}
48
